short_summary: Purchase of galvanized steel mesh baskets
description: Purchase of galvanized steel mesh baskets with delivery in Montreal
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### UNSPSC Class Code
*Warehousing equipment and supplies*

#### RFP Reference and Contact Information
WS4204077257, Demande de propositions - Exigences de capacité

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact: Melanie Caty (SPAC/PSPC), melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of galvanized steel mesh baskets. The baskets must be delivered to a location in Montreal, Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Issue Date**: September 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 17, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Geographic Location**: Montreal, Quebec
* **Contracting Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

#### Tender Evaluation
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Annex
Please refer to Annex A for detailed requirements and specifications.

#### Related Resources
Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17400287?extsite=MTc0MDAyODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
